title: Find the Missing Letters
content:
Find the Missing Letters Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Rivington Reward 320 Gold

Find the Missing Letters

Find the Missing Letters is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find the Missing Letters can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Find the Missing Letters Objectives

Search for the missing pigeons

Carrier pigeons have gone missing. Postmaste
